definition: to drift and live without purpose (idiom); to drag out an ignoble existence
if/supposing/careless/negligent/temporarily
surname Gou
and/moreover/yet/for the time being/to be about to/both (... and...)
to steal/to pilfer/to snatch/thief/stealthily
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: I'm just surviving, that's why I want you to know.
sentences.chinese: 我是在苟且偷生，这就是为什么我想让你知道。

sentences.english: It's better to die with hornor than to live in infamy .
sentences.chinese: 与其苟且偷生不如光荣而死。

sentences.english: Run, and you'll live… at least a while.
sentences.chinese: 逃跑，至少能苟且偷生，年复一年，直到寿终正寝。

sentences.english: Run, and you will live at least a while.
sentences.chinese: 逃跑，至少能苟且偷生，年复一年，直到寿终正寝。

sentences.english: Run, and you'll live at least a while.
sentences.chinese: 逃跑，至少能苟且偷生，年复一年，直到寿终正寝。

sentences.english: Unlike many men who lived long after, Henry Young did not die in vain.
sentences.chinese: 与许多苟且偷生的人不同，亨利扬不要白白地死去。

sentences.english: Lord, let me never, never, outlive my love for thee.
sentences.chinese: 主，我莫苟且偷生，如若对你爱减退。

sentences.english: It saved one's skin; but it did not help the growth of a complex economy.
sentences.chinese: 这样苟且偷生，但对发展综合经济却无任何帮助。

sentences.english: I had rather die than live in dishonor.
sentences.chinese: 我宁可死也不愿苟且偷生。

sentences.english: They purchase life at the expense of honour.

definition: to bear humiliation to save one's skin (idiom)
to live without purpose
to struggle on whilst at death's door (idiom)
to drift through life
seeking only ease and comfort (idiom); making no attempt to improve oneself/taking things easily without attending to responsibilities
remaining breath/last gasp
to endure humiliation as part of an important mission (idiom); to suffer in silence
greedy for life, afraid of death (idiom); craven and cowardly/clinging abjectly to life/only interested in saving one's neck
see 苟且偷安[gou3 qie3 tou1 an1]
to extend one's neck in preparation for execution (idiom)
at dawn, not sure of lasting to evening (idiom); precarious state/imminent crisis/living from hand to mouth
survival/the struggle to eke out a living/to seek for continued existence
to meet death
to rely on others for the air one breathes (idiom); to depend on sb's whim for one's living
to abandon oneself (idiom)/to let oneself go
to have one's name go down in history as a byword for infamy (idiom)
